messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling conference
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Ren Allen  We need to have a Canadian version of an unschooling conference.. I think somebody had the same idea...Kelly
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ren Allen <starsuncloud@...>

"We need to have a Canadian version of an unschooling conference.."

I think somebody had the same idea...Kelly mentioned a mini-conference
in Canada next year. Can't remember any details or location.
Kelly?

-=-=-

It's still in the planning stages. And Canada is a right big country! <g> Albuquerque might be closer
for *some*! <g> I'm sure the coordinator will be advertising as soon as she's ready!

~KellyKelly LovejoyConference CoordinatorLive and Learn Unschooling Conferencehttp://liveandlearnconference.org


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Unschooling conference
messages.msgSnippet: The conference is not in St. Louis next year, it moves each time. Albuquerque is the next site...Kelly will have updated info. on the website soon! Ren
messages.messageBody:
The conference is not in St. Louis next year, it moves each time.

Albuquerque is the next site...Kelly will have updated info. on the
website soon!

Ren
